name: Fetch customer cards using CIF Key

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000933079696000"
When I fetch the cards for CIF Key: "0100000933079696000"

children.description: Get customer cards using http get: 0100000933079696000

testSteps.description:
Then the following card should be returned in the list
| cardID | cardMailCode | cardNumber | cardType | cardsStyle | embossingNameText | plasticCardNSCText |
| 000039854369 | Customer Address | 00012094 | Visa Debit Card | Classic | OWEN CROSSMAN | 931365 |

children.description: Validate response: CardData [mailingCode=null, pendingActionDate=null, latestIssueDate=null, plasticCardNSCText=931365, invalidPINAttemptsCount=null, pendingActionCode=null, cardTypeCode=null, styleCode=null, pinResetCount=null, customerChargeInd=null, pinIssueDate=null, currentCardStatusCode=null, expiryDate=null, cardNumber=00012094, embossingNameText=OWEN CROSSMAN, lastUpdatedDateTime=null, cardID=000039854369, relationshipTypeCode=null, transactionChargeInd=null, juristrictionCode=null, cardType=Visa Debit Card, cardsPendAct=null, cardsStyle=Classic, cardStatus=null, cardMailCode=Customer Address]

userStory.storyName: Fetch the cards for a customer

title: Fetch customer cards using CIF Key

tags.name: Fetch the cards for a customer
